snippet: Olympic organizers say they might have to use $700 million in government money to meet the operating budget for the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Games.
abstract: Olympic organizers say they might have to use $700 million in government money to meet operating budget for the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Games.
lead_paragraph: Olympic organizers say they might have to use $700 million in government money to meet the operating budget for the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Games.
